This is a great FPS game if that's your thing. In my opinion CS:GO is hands down the best First Person Shooter; and arguably one of the most popular game in the world.

There are still a few hackers active, however they won't be for long.

if you have not tried playing CS:GO, come give it a shot; the download is free.
